title: Add integration tests with actual claude CLI
description: Need integration tests that actually invoke claude CLI with test prompts to verify argument passing, permission modes, and response parsing work correctly. Should use test fixtures and mock responses where possible.

title: Implement immutable value objects
description: Create LogEntry and LogContext value objects

title: Analyze ClaudeCodeCli/Sandbox overlap and execution environment improvements
description: Comprehensive analysis of overlap between ClaudeCodeCli execution classes and Sandbox package. Identify potential refactoring opportunities, general CLI infrastructure that should be moved to Sandbox, and improvements needed for diverse execution environments. Create research document with findings and recommendations.

title: Code review summary: ClaudeCodeCli implementation assessment
description: PEER REVIEW SUMMARY: The team delivered excellent foundational work with proper DDD architecture, sandboxed execution, and comprehensive CLI argument building. Key strengths: mirrors Beads patterns, typed value objects, configurable drivers. Gaps: missing tests, response parsing, resume modes, validation. Overall: solid architecture ready for completion.

title: Add comprehensive tests for Bedrock driver
description: Create tests for Bedrock driver including API key auth, region endpoints, and compatibility with OpenAI patterns

title: Missing integration tests despite task being marked complete
description: Task instructor-php-1fg was marked closed but no integration tests exist. Need tests that verify: 1) SandboxCommandExecutor actually executes commands, 2) Full end-to-end workflow with mock claude responses, 3) Error handling for command failures, timeouts, invalid outputs. Unit tests only test argument building, not execution.

title: ResponseParser lacks proper error handling and type safety
description: ResponseParser.php has several issues: 1) json_decode() failures return null but code assumes array, 2) No validation of decoded JSON structure, 3) preg_split() can return false but code assumes array, 4) Stream parsing doesn't handle partial/malformed lines gracefully. Needs defensive programming.

title: Research existing driver implementations and architecture
description: Examine existing drivers to understand patterns, interfaces, and common implementations

title: Create PHPStan documentation files
description: Create PHPSTAN_QUICK_REF.md and PHPSTAN_SETUP.md files and move them to docs-internal/development/ directory. Consolidate PHPStan information from existing docs.

title: Add region-aware endpoint configuration
description: Implement logic to build region-specific Bedrock endpoints and handle model ID validation for Bedrock

title: Analyze Claude Code hooks for execution control
description: Review hooks-reference to understand lifecycle events, matcher patterns, decision outputs, environment handling, and how to gate/modify tool usage for controlled CLI automation.

title: Clean up duplicate CLAUDE.md in .taskmaster/
description: Remove or symlink the duplicate CLAUDE.md file in .taskmaster/ directory to avoid maintenance overhead.

title: ClaudeRequest constructor is becoming unwieldy - needs builder pattern
description: ClaudeRequest constructor now has 13+ parameters making it hard to use and understand. Should implement builder pattern: ClaudeRequestBuilder->withPrompt()->withOutputFormat()->build(). Current approach violates clean code principles and will become harder to maintain.

title: Audit and update documentation references
description: Scan all documentation files for references to moved files and update paths. Check CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, CONTRIBUTOR_GUIDE.md, and docs-internal/README.md.

title: Phase 1: Move general CLI infrastructure from ClaudeCodeCli to Sandbox
description: Move CommandSpec, Argv, and SandboxDriver enum from ClaudeCodeCli to Sandbox package as they are general CLI infrastructure. Update all references and maintain backward compatibility.

title: Implement core pipeline interfaces
description: Create EventFilter, EventEnricher, EventFormatter, LogWriter interfaces

title: PEER REVIEW: Latest ClaudeCodeCli work assessment
description: CRITICAL ASSESSMENT: Team addressed most feedback but has significant quality issues. POSITIVES: Fixed type bug, added comprehensive CLI support, good test coverage, functional implementation. NEGATIVES: Tests in wrong location (P0), poor error handling, missing integration tests, architectural debt forming. Grade: C+ - Works but needs quality improvements before production.

title: Implement BedrockBodyFormat for request formatting
description: Create body formatter that handles anthropic_version field and Bedrock-specific request format differences

title: Create Inference/Embeddings Symfony example (B02_LLMAdvanced)
description: Create LoggingSymfony example using Inference and Embeddings with bundle integration

title: Implement BedrockDriver extending OpenAICompatibleDriver
description: Create dedicated Bedrock driver that extends OpenAI compatibility with Bedrock-specific features like region endpoints, guardrails, and API key authentication

title: Fix ClaudeRequest constructor parameter type issues
description: ClaudeRequest.php:21 has 'private PathList $additionalDirs = null' but PathList can't be null. Should be 'private ?PathList $additionalDirs = null' or use PathList::none() as default. Also missing validation for required fields like prompt.

title: Create Laravel logging example (A02_Advanced)
description: Create new LoggingLaravel example showing framework integration

title: Catalog Claude CLI commands and flags
description: Extract CLI command set, non-interactive options, permission-mode flags, IO formats, and agent/system-prompt customization capabilities from CLI reference to inform controlled execution design.

title: Create Symfony logging example (A02_Advanced)
description: Create new LoggingSymfony example showing bundle integration

title: Create Inference/Embeddings Laravel example (B02_LLMAdvanced)
description: Create LoggingLaravel example using Inference and Embeddings with framework integration

title: Move TEST_MATRIX.md to docs-internal/testing/
description: Move TEST_MATRIX.md from root to docs-internal/testing/TEST_MATRIX.md and update any references in other documentation files.

title: Synthesize Claude Code CLI research
description: Summarize findings from Claude Code docs into ./research/2025-12-claude-code-cli/, mapping capabilities, control points, and integration considerations similar to Beads mechanism.

title: Create logging examples with new functional pipeline package
description: Create comprehensive logging examples for Laravel, Symfony, and refactor existing examples to use the new functional pipeline architecture

title: Test existing OpenAICompatibleDriver with Bedrock endpoint
description: Validate if existing OpenAI driver can work with Bedrock's OpenAI-compatible API endpoint by testing with a Bedrock API key

title: Create framework-specific factories
description: LaravelLoggingFactory and SymfonyLoggingFactory with minimal wiring

title: Test issue: Verify bd/bv setup
description: This is a test issue to verify that bd/bv is properly set up for instructor-php project

title: Validation in ClaudeCommandBuilder needs improvement
description: Current validation only checks basic conflicts but misses: 1) File path existence for systemPromptFile, 2) JSON syntax validation for agentsJson, 3) Directory existence for additionalDirs, 4) Model name format validation, 5) sessionId format validation. Should fail fast with clear error messages.

title: Create functional logging pipeline implementation
description: Implement the functional logging pipeline architecture from scalability analysis study

title: Add PSR and Monolog writers
description: LogWriter implementations for PSR-3 and Monolog

title: Research Bedrock OpenAI-compatible API approach
description: Investigate using Bedrock's /chat/completions endpoint with either AWS credentials or Bedrock API keys for simpler implementation

title: Design AWS authentication strategy for Bedrock driver
description: Decide between AWS SDK dependency vs manual SigV4 implementation. Evaluate trade-offs and define authentication approach.

title: Add Bedrock API key authentication support
description: Implement Bedrock API key authentication with fallback to AWS credentials, supporting both short-term and long-term API keys

title: Move SCRIPTS.md to docs-internal/development/
description: Move SCRIPTS.md from root to docs-internal/development/SCRIPTS.md and update any references in other documentation files.

title: Phase 2: Implement environment detection system
description: Create EnvironmentDetector class for automatic WSL2/Docker/container detection. Add capability detection for user namespaces, cgroups. Implement environment-specific configuration profiles.

title: CRITICAL: Move ClaudeCodeCli tests to proper package location
description: Tests are incorrectly placed in root tests/Unit/ instead of packages/auxiliary/tests/Unit/. This violates monorepo package isolation and will break automated test discovery for the auxiliary package. Move to packages/auxiliary/tests/Unit/ClaudeCodeCli/

title: Implement JSON/stream-json response parsing
description: Missing response parsing DTOs for --output-format json and stream-json. Need ClaudeResponse DTO with parsed messages, cost/duration metadata, and streaming event handling as documented in design notes.

title: Research and implement Amazon Bedrock integration
description: Add Bedrock driver to packages/polyglot/src/Inference/Drivers with proper authentication, request/response mapping, and streaming support

title: Design multi-agent orchestration platform architecture
description: Architect comprehensive multi-agent CLI orchestration platform supporting Claude, OpenAI Codex, Charm, OpenCode, Google Gemini, Jules, etc. with local/remote execution, REST APIs, SSH tunnels, governance, monitoring, and workflow orchestration capabilities.

title: Examine existing logging examples and patterns
description: Review LoggingMonolog and LoggingPSR examples to understand current patterns

title: Create composable pipeline implementations
description: Implement filters, enrichers, formatters that compose like Lego blocks

title: Phase 3: Implement automatic driver fallback system
description: Create FallbackExecutor with intelligent driver selection and graceful degradation. Extract retry logic from SandboxCommandExecutor to RetryingExecutor in Sandbox package.

title: Improve ClaudeCommandBuilder error handling
description: ClaudeCommandBuilder methods should validate inputs (empty strings, invalid paths) and throw meaningful exceptions. Current implementation silently handles some edge cases that should be explicit failures.

title: Add resume/continue command building support
description: ClaudeCommandBuilder only supports headless mode. Need buildResume() and buildContinue() methods as outlined in design notes, plus support for --permission-prompt-tool and structured stdin streaming.

title: Write Pest tests for logging pipeline
description: Create comprehensive test suite under packages/logging/tests using Pest

title: Add comprehensive tests for ClaudeCodeCli package
description: The implementation lacks tests. Need unit tests for: CommandBuilder argv generation, ExecutionPolicy defaults, SandboxCommandExecutor retry logic, Argv/PathList value objects, and integration tests with mock claude responses.

title: Refactor existing Monolog example to use functional pipeline
description: Update LoggingMonolog example to use new pipeline architecture instead of manual wiretap

title: DecodedObject is too generic - needs semantic structure
description: DecodedObject is just array<string,mixed> wrapper with no semantic meaning. Should create typed DTOs for Claude CLI response structure (messages, cost, duration, tool calls, etc.) instead of generic array access. Current design loses type safety benefits.

title: Move REFACTORING_PLAN.md to tmp/
description: Move REFACTORING_PLAN.md from root to tmp/REFACTORING_PLAN.md since it's active WIP documentation, not permanent internal docs.

title: Study Claude Code getting-started docs
description: Read overview, quickstart, and common-workflows docs to extract capabilities, interactive patterns, permission modes, and automation-relevant behaviors for Claude Code CLI.

title: Internal documentation cleanup and reorganization
description: Clean up internal documentation files in monorepo root by moving developer-specific docs to docs-internal/ and updating all references. Maintain public docs in root for discoverability.

title: Refactor existing PSR example to use functional pipeline
description: Update LoggingPSR example to use new pipeline architecture

title: Improve ClaudeCodeCli usage documentation and examples
description: README.md needs more complete usage examples, error handling patterns, and guidance on when to use different permission modes. Add examples for resume/continue when implemented.

title: Create Inference/Embeddings Monolog example (B02_LLMAdvanced)
description: Create LoggingMonolog example using Inference and Embeddings classes

title: Add validation for Claude CLI flag combinations
description: Missing validation in ClaudeCommandBuilder for invalid combinations like --system-prompt + --system-prompt-file, or dangerous flags validation. Should prevent conflicting options and validate file paths.
